title: Apply Exam Xpresss branding assets and fix failed deployment

requirements.text: Create clean, watermark-free Exam Xpresss logo assets from the user-uploaded logo image(s) and add them as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: A clean transparent logo file exists at /assets/generated/exam-xpresss-logo-clean.dim_512x512.png.
The generated logo has no visible watermark/artifacts and maintains crisp edges and centered composition.
The generated assets are committed under frontend/public/assets/generated (served statically; not routed through the backend).

requirements.text: Generate favicon/app icon PNGs from the clean logo and ensure the app uses them in the HTML document head.
acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated: exam-xpresss-favicon.dim_32x32.png, exam-xpresss-icon.dim_192x192.png, exam-xpresss-icon.dim_512x512.png.
frontend/index.html references the generated favicon and app icons using <link rel="icon"> and apple-touch-icon appropriately.
Browser tab favicon displays the Exam Xpresss icon when running the app.

requirements.text: Update/verify UI branding to use the Exam Xpresss logo as the primary brand mark in the header and remove any visible 'Caffeine AI' / 'caffeine.ai' branding across the UI (including footer attribution).
acceptanceCriteria: The header brand mark uses /assets/generated/exam-xpresss-logo-clean.dim_512x512.png and remains responsive with the existing header layout intact.
No visible text/link attribution to 'Caffeine AI' or 'caffeine.ai' appears anywhere in the UI (including the footer).
All user-facing text related to branding is in English.

requirements.text: Resolve the build/deployment failure so the project successfully builds and deploys to the Internet Computer without errors.
acceptanceCriteria: A clean install + build completes successfully (frontend build and Motoko canister build).
Deployment/push to network completes successfully without the previously encountered deployment error.
No runtime errors occur on initial load after deployment (home page renders and navigation works).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend migration (backend/migration.mo) if an upgrade requiring state migration is necessary.

Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or any code under frontend/src/components/ui; compose/consume them instead.
Store and serve generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (do not proxy images through the backend).
nonGoals: Add new product features unrelated to branding (e.g., new pages, new payment flows, new test/course functionality).
Introduce third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Add external databases or non-Motoko backend services.

required: Clean circular 'EX' logo on transparent background (exam-xpresss-logo-clean.dim_512x512.png)
Red circular 'EX' favicon icon on transparent background (exam-xpresss-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
Red circular 'EX' app icon on transparent background (exam-xpresss-icon.dim_192x192.png)
Red circular 'EX' app icon on transparent background (exam-xpresss-icon.dim_512x512.png)
edits: Remove any watermark/artifacts and export a clean transparent logo asset (IMG_20260121_194813_007-removebg-preview-3.png > exam-xpresss-logo-clean.dim_512x512.png)
Remove any watermark/artifacts and export a clean transparent logo asset (IMG_20260121_194813_007-removebg-preview-4.png > exam-xpresss-logo-clean.dim_512x512.png)
